page.title: OMiSCID Download Page
page.content:
Release
Access to the sources will be provided through a "forge". The forge is currently being set up, please come in 1/2 weeks, it should be done then.
Specificities
Java implementation The java implementation of OMiSCID containing basic classes and an OSGI bundle version.
C++ implementation The C++ implementation of OMiSCID containing the necessary files and instruction about how to build the library.
Tcl implementation The Tcl implementation of OMiSCID.
Availability The availability of all materials mentionned above is postponed to September.
Installation & Tutorials
Documentation on how to install and tutorials are available on the documentation page.
